Posts.Content: Just finished 44 days of IGRT. Now the three month wait to see if worked. Hardest part of the treatments was having to drive 50 miles a day. Do have some problems getting rid of the water. Am on Rapaflo, which does not seem to do any good, but am afraid to not take it just in case it is working a little. People at Southeast Regional Prostate Cancer Center are great. All are very professional, from the girl at the front desk to the people that operate the machine.
Posts.Title: Now the wait.

Posts.Content: Age 68. PSA year ago was 2.3 - tested in December 2012 - 4.5. Biopsy done Jan 29 - found out yesturday 3 of 10 tests positive. Having bone scan Feb 8th. Unk what Gleason score is. Now what? Is this really bad - why bone scan?
Posts.Title: Now what?

Posts.Content: Originally Posted by cal680 Age 68. PSA year ago was 2.3 - tested in December 2012 - 4.5. Biopsy done Jan 29 - found out yesturday 3 of 10 tests positive. Having bone scan Feb 8th. Unk what Gleason score is. Now what? Is this really bad - why bone scan? Gleason - 6 (3X3) 3 of 10 positive - 2/5% 1/10% - 2 PIN. Start IMRT 2/19/13
Posts.Title: Now what?
